scenesWithText.concept_description: An ancient, crude drawing of a leafy plant with a question mark symbol. A silhouette of a primitive human figure appears, gazing curiously at the plant. The scene uses earthy tones, almost like a cave painting.
scenesWithText.key_takeaway: Before supermarkets, before even written history, one humble leafy green began its epic journey.
scenesWithText.overlay_text: Before History: Leafy Green's Epic Journey.

scenesWithText.concept_description: An animated map, starting from ancient Persia (modern-day Iran). A glowing line traces a path eastward towards India and then China. Stylized ancient Persian script or symbols appear briefly as the origin point.
scenesWithText.key_takeaway: Its tale begins in ancient Persia, over 2000 years ago, a wild ancestor spreading east along ancient trade routes.
scenesWithText.overlay_text: Persia, 2000 years. Wild ancestor spreads east.

scenesWithText.concept_description: The map animation continues, tracing the path from China westward, showing Arab traders introducing it to North Africa and Spain, then spreading across medieval Europe. A stylized medieval illuminated manuscript drawing of spinach emerges.
scenesWithText.key_takeaway: Arab traders then brought it west, reaching Europe in the Middle Ages, slowly conquering palates across continents.

scenesWithText.concept_description: A modern, vibrant spinach leaf icon rotates, transforming into a subtle globe, symbolizing its global presence. A healthy, green aura emanates from it, concluding with a simple, strong visual statement.
scenesWithText.key_takeaway: This humble plant, a truly global traveler, stands as a testament to agriculture's ancient roots and enduring power.
scenesWithText.overlay_text: Global Plant: Ancient Roots, Enduring Power.
